flavorText.text:
はっぱの　ぶぶんは　カッターになって
あいてを　きりさく。くちからは
なんでも　とかす　えきたいを　はく。

まず　どくのこなを　はき　あいての
うごきを　とめて　しまってから
ようかいえきで　とどめを　さす。

よるに　なると　おしりの　フックを　きの　えだに
ひっかけて　ぶらさがり　ねむりに　つく。
ねぞうが　わるいと　あさ　おっこちているよ。

よるに　なると　おしりの　フックを　きの　えだに
ひっかけて　ぶらさがり　ねむりに　つく。
ねぞうが　わるいと　あさ　おっこちているよ。

おなかが　へると　てあたりしだいに
うごくものを　のみこんでは
ようかいえきで　とどめを　さす。

おなかが　へると　てあたりしだいに
うごくものを　のみこんでは
ようかいえきで　とどめを　さす。

잎사귀 부분은 칼날이 되어
상대를 베어버린다. 입에서는
무엇이든 녹이는 액체를 뿜어낸다.

우선 독가루를 뿌려 상대의
움직임을 멈추게 하고 나서
용해액으로 숨통을 끊는다.

밤이 되면 엉덩이의 갈고리를 나뭇가지에
걸고 매달려서 잠든다.
잠버릇이 나쁘면 아침에 떨어져 있다.

밤이 되면 엉덩이의 갈고리를 나뭇가지에
걸고 매달려서 잠든다.
잠버릇이 나쁘면 아침에 떨어져 있다.

배가 고프면 움직이는 것을
닥치는 대로 삼킨 다음
용해액으로 마무리한다.

배가 고프면 움직이는 것을
닥치는 대로 삼킨 다음
용해액으로 마무리한다.

肚子餓的時候會把周圍
會動的東西全都吞下去，
然後用溶解液致其於死地。

肚子餓的時候會把周圍
會動的東西全都吞下去，
然後用溶解液致其於死地。

Un Pokémon végétal. Il capture les
proies étourdies en les endormant
à l’aide d’une poudre toxique.

Un Pokémon végétal. Il capture les
proies étourdies en les endormant
à l’aide d’une poudre toxique.

Ses membres en forme de feuilles permettent à
Boustiflor de trancher ses adversaires. Il crache un
fluide capable de tout dissoudre.

Il crache de la Poudre Toxik pour immobiliser sa proie
et il l’achève avec de l’Acide.

Boustiflor est doté d’un gros crochet. La nuit, ce Pokémon
s’accroche à une branche pour s’endormir. Quand il a
un sommeil agité, il se réveille par terre.

Boustiflor est doté d’un gros crochet. La nuit, ce Pokémon
s’accroche à une branche pour s’endormir. Quand il a
un sommeil agité, il se réveille par terre.

Quand il a faim, il avale tout ce qui bouge,
puis achève ses proies avec de l’acide.

Quand il a faim, il avale tout ce qui bouge,
puis achève ses proies avec de l’acide.

Die Blätter werden eingesetzt, um Gegner
aufzuschlitzen. Dieses Pokémon spuckt eine
Flüssigkeit, die alles auflöst.

Dieses Pokémon lähmt den Gegner mit Giftpuder,
bevor es ihn mit Säure erledigt.

Ultrigaria hat einen großen Haken an seinem Hinterteil.
Nachts hängt sich dieses Pokémon zum Schlafen an einen
Ast. Wenn es sich im Schlaf bewegt, kann es passieren,
dass es auf dem Boden wieder aufwacht.

Ultrigaria hat einen großen Haken an seinem Hinterteil.
Nachts hängt sich dieses Pokémon zum Schlafen an einen
Ast. Wenn es sich im Schlaf bewegt, kann es passieren,
dass es auf dem Boden wieder aufwacht.

Wenn es hungrig ist, schnappt es willkürlich nach
allem, was sich bewegt. Nachdem es seine Beute
verschluckt hat, schaltet es sie mit Säure aus.

Wenn es hungrig ist, schnappt es willkürlich nach
allem, was sich bewegt. Nachdem es seine Beute
verschluckt hat, schaltet es sie mit Säure aus.

Las hojas que tiene actúan como cuchillas en
combate. Otra de sus armas es el corrosivo fluido
que expulsa.

Escupe Polvo Veneno para envenenar al enemigo y,
luego, lo liquida con Ácido.

Weepinbell tiene un gancho a modo de extremidad superior
trasera, que usa por la noche para colgarse de una rama y
echarse a dormir. Si se mueve mientras duerme, puede acabar
en el suelo.

Weepinbell tiene un gancho a modo de extremidad superior
trasera, que usa por la noche para colgarse de una rama y
echarse a dormir. Si se mueve mientras duerme, puede acabar
en el suelo.

Cuando tiene hambre, engulle a todo lo que
se mueve. La pobre presa acaba disuelta en
sus ácidos.

Cuando tiene hambre, engulle a todo lo que
se mueve. La pobre presa acaba disuelta en
sus ácidos.

Si serve delle foglie laterali come lame contro i
nemici. Il fluido che secerne dalla bocca scioglie
qualsiasi cosa.

Sputa Velenpolvere per immobilizzare il nemico e poi
lo finisce con il suo Acido.

Weepinbell è dotato di un grande uncino posteriore.
Di notte lo usa per appendersi a un ramo e mettersi a
dormire. Talvolta, agitandosi nel sonno, si sveglia al suolo.

Weepinbell è dotato di un grande uncino posteriore.
Di notte lo usa per appendersi a un ramo e mettersi a
dormire. Talvolta, agitandosi nel sonno, si sveglia al suolo.

Quando è affamato divora qualsiasi cosa
gli capiti a tiro e la scioglie con i suoi
potenti acidi.

Quando è affamato divora qualsiasi cosa
gli capiti a tiro e la scioglie con i suoi
potenti acidi.

It spits out
POISONPOWDER to
immobilize the enemy and then
finishes it with
a spray of ACID.

It spits out
POISONPOWDER to
immobilize the enemy and then
finishes it with
a spray of ACID.

When hungry, it
swallows anything
that moves. Its hapless prey is
melted inside by
strong acids.

Even though it is
filled with ACID,
it does not melt because it also
oozes a neutral­
izing fluid.

If its prey is
bigger than its
mouth, it slices up the victim with
sharp leaves, then
eats every morsel.

When it's hungry,
it swings its
razor-sharp leaves, slicing up
any unlucky object
nearby for food.

WEEPINBELL has a large hook on its rear
end. At night, the POKéMON hooks on to
a tree branch and goes to sleep. If it moves around in its sleep, it may
wake up to find itself on the ground.

WEEPINBELL has a large hook on its rear
end. At night, the POKéMON hooks on to
a tree branch and goes to sleep. If it moves around in its sleep, it may
wake up to find itself on the ground.

At night, a WEEPINBELL hangs on to a tree
branch with its hooked rear and sleeps.
If it moves around in its sleep, it may
wake up to find itself on the ground.

The leafy parts act as cutters for
slashing foes. It spits a fluid that
dissolves everything.

It spits out POISONPOWDER to immobilize
the enemy and then finishes it with a
spray of ACID.

A Pokémon that appears to be a
plant. It captures unwary prey by
dousing them with a toxic powder.

A Pokémon that appears to be a
plant. It captures unwary prey by
dousing them with a toxic powder.

A Pokémon that appears to be a
plant. It captures unwary prey by
dousing them with a toxic powder.

Even though it is filled with acid,
it does not melt because it also
oozes a protective fluid.

If its prey is bigger than its
mouth, it slices up the victim with
sharp leaves, then eats every morsel.

A Pokémon that appears to be a
plant. It captures unwary prey by
dousing them with a toxic powder.

A Pokémon that appears to be a
plant. It captures unwary prey by
dousing them with a toxic powder.

A Pokémon that appears to be a
plant. It captures unwary prey by
dousing them with a toxic powder.

A Pokémon that appears to be a
plant. It captures unwary prey by
dousing them with a toxic powder.

The leafy parts act as cutters for slashing foes.
It spits a fluid that dissolves everything.

It spits out Poison Powder to immobilize the enemy
and then finishes it with a spray of Acid.

Weepinbell has a large hook on its rear end. At night, the
Pokémon hooks on to a tree branch and goes to sleep.
If it moves around in its sleep, it may wake up to find itself
on the ground.

Weepinbell has a large hook on its rear end. At night, the
Pokémon hooks on to a tree branch and goes to sleep.
If it moves around in its sleep, it may wake up to find itself
on the ground.

When hungry, it swallows anything that moves.
Its hapless prey is dissolved by strong acids.

When hungry, it swallows anything that moves.
Its hapless prey is dissolved by strong acids.

它在肚子饿的时候会
吞掉周围会动的东西，
分泌溶解液让其致命。

它在肚子饿的时候会
吞掉周围会动的东西，
分泌溶解液让其致命。
